title: unesco_heritage_Manovo-Gounda_St_Floris_National_Park
text:
Name: Manovo-Gounda St Floris National Park. short_description:

The importance of this park derives from its wealth of flora and fauna. Its vast savannahs are home to a wide variety of species: black rhinoceroses, elephants, cheetahs, leopards, wild dogs, red-fronted gazelles and buffalo, while various types of waterfowl are to be found in the northern floodplains.

. date_inscribed: 1988. danger: 1. date_end: . longitude: 21.5. latitude: 9. area_hectares: 1740000. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: Central African Republic. Region: Africa. iso_code: cf. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
